document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">After </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">hundred </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">years </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Nobody </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">knows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">Place </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Agony </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">enacted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">there </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Motionless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Peace </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Weeds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">triumphant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">ranged </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff903c">Strangers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">strolled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">spelled </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">At </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">lone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Orthography </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Elder </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Dead </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Winds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9ca0ff">Fields </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Recollect </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">Instinct </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">picking </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">up </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#301034">Key </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Dropped </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">memory </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: After a hundred years
